translated: The Monastic Code of the Theravāda Vinaya
The Nuns’ Analysis🔽The chapter on offenses entailing confession
The sub-chapter on parks
The training rule on Pasākhi jāta

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
translated: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṁ gaṇḍaṁ purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā bhedāpesi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpesi
translated: a certain nun had a boil that had appeared on her vulva. She had it lanced by a man in private.

original: Atha kho so puriso taṁ bhikkhuniṁ dūsetuṁ upakkami.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ tam bhikkhunim dūsetum upakkami
translated: Then that man tried to rape her.
She screamed.

analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ upadhāvitvā tam bhikkhunim etat avocuḥ
translated: The nuns came running and asked her why she had screamed.

analyzed: kissa tva ayye vissaram akāsi iti
translated: “Why did you scream?”

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesi
translated: She told them what had happened.

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
translated: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,🔽“How could a nun have a boil lanced by a man in private?” …

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṁ gaṇḍaṁ purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā bhedāpessatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpessati iti pe
translated: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?” …

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṁ gaṇḍaṁ purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā bhedāpetī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpeti iti
translated: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
“It’s true, Sir.”
The Buddha rebuked him …

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṁ gaṇḍaṁ purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā bhedāpessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpessati
translated: “How could a nun do this?

analyzed: na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe
translated: This will affect people’s confidence …”🔽And he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—🔽“Yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṁ gaṇḍaṁ vā rudhitaṁ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṁ vā gaṇaṁ🔽vā purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu  yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam vā rudhitam vā an apaloketvā saṅgham vā gaṇa  vā purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya
translated: “Well then, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:

original: vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.🔽Yā panāti🔽yā yādisā …pe…
analyzed: vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā pācittiyanti  yā panāti  yā yā disā pe
translated: ‘If a nun, without getting permission from the Sangha or a group, has a boil or a wound on her lower body lanced, burst, cut open, or treated by a man, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
If a nun:🔽if a fully ordained nun.

analyzed: pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
translated: … this is the meaning of “nun” in this case.
On her lower body:
below the navel and above the knees.
Born:
that which is born there.🔽Boil:
any kind of boil.
Wound:
any kind of wound.
Without getting permission:
without asking.
The Sangha:
the Sangha of nuns is what is meant.
A group:
several nuns is what is meant.
A man:

original: manussapuriso, na yakkho, na peto, na tiracchānagato, viññū paṭibalo dūsetuṁ.
analyzed: manussa purisaḥ na yakkhaḥ na petaḥ na tiracchāna gataḥ viññū paṭibalaḥ dūsetu
translated: a human male, not a male spirit, not a male ghost, not a male animal. He must be capable of sexual intercourse.
Together:
with one.
With one another:

original: puriso ceva hoti bhikkhunī ca.🔽“Bhindā”ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.🔽Bhinne āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: puriso ca iva hoti bhikkhunī ca  bhindāti āṇāpeti āpatti dukkaṭassa  bhinne āpatti pācittiyassa
translated: there is a man and a nun.🔽if she tells him to break it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽When it is broken, she commits an offense entailing confession.
if she tells him to split it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: Phālite āpatti pācittiyassa.🔽“Dhovā”ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.🔽Dhovite āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: phālite āpatti pācittiyassa  dhovāti āṇāpeti āpatti dukkaṭassa  dhovite āpatti pācittiyassa
translated: When it is split, she commits an offense entailing confession.🔽if she tells him to wash it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.🔽When it is washed, she commits an offense entailing confession.
if she tells him to smear it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: Litte āpatti pācittiyassa.🔽“Bandhāhī”ti āṇāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: litte āpatti pācittiyassa  bandhāhi iti āṇāpeti āpatti dukkaṭassa
translated: When it is smeared, she commits an offense entailing confession.🔽if she tells him to tie it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
When it is tied, she commits an offense entailing confession.
If he tells her to untie it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
When it is untied, he commits an offense entailing confession.

original: apaloketvā bhedāpeti vā phālāpeti vā dhovāpeti vā ālimpāpeti vā bandhāpeti vā mocāpeti vā,
analyzed: apaloketvā bhedāpeti vā phālāpeti vā dhovāpeti vā ālimpāpeti vā bandhāpeti vā mocāpeti vā
translated: There is no offense if he has her look at it, have it mended, have it washed, have it dyed, have it sewn, or have it untied;
if he has a knowledgeable companion do it;
if he is insane;
if he is the first offender.🔽The tenth training rule is finished.
The sixth sub-chapter on parks is finished.
